reviewtext: I wasn't able to find one of these in local outlets.  I have a bunch of VCR tapes I want to convert to digital, but my VHS player had given me a "Clean heads" message, and I had noticed more than usual static when I was playing the videos.  This cleared that problem up. ( The "wet" media in the package appears to be isopropyl alcohol, which I will use when the small bottle runs out.)
